attributes.action: Stop the massacre in DRC (ex Zaire)
attributes.additional_details:
The conflict in the Democratic Republic of Congo has killed almost 7 millions people since 1996.
Rebels from Uganda, Rwanda and Burundi are invading the est of the country and kill everyday in order to take possession of the minerals resources.
Women and little girls are raped everyday in front of their families, men are burnt alive and small boys are forced to join the rebel groups and are trained to kill.
The West ignores this genocide and nothing is done to help the country.
It's time to stop this massacre, enough souls are gone for us to enjoy mobile phones, cars and jewellery! It's time to say NO MORE! STOP THIS MASSACRE!
